content:
{"name": "The Hope Line Resource Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Walk in to make an appointment or call (718) 402.1212 Monday after 9:30am (appointments limited).
Bronx resident.
Valid ID.
Proof of address (for example: electric bill, phone bill, shelter residency letter). Once a month per household.
Schedule your appointment online now with Plentiful.
Walk-ins welcome on a first come first served basis without an appointment on Wednesdays beginning at 1:30pm while supplies last.
The Hopeline Center can help with all SNAP questions, whether you want to apply, recertify, or just update your case. They're available to help Monday-Wednesday from 9:30am-4:30pm. You can stop by during office hours or make an appointment first by calling  718-402-1212 x 104. Available in English or Spanish.
 
 To make appointment you can also text the word 'Hopeline' to 726879", "email": "", "url": "https://thehopeline.org/services/food/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "884 East 163rd Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Woodstock", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10459", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.82078459999999, "longitude": -73.8985502}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 402-1212", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
